decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title(s) Site Location Plan, Existing Block Plan; Proposed Block Plan; 002 rev C (as revised 04/08/2021) (Existing Plans, Elevations and Section); 002 rev F (as revised 04/08/2021) (Proposed Plans, Elevations and Section)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), SPD4 (Residential Extensions) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted. No windows or openings shall, at any time, be inserted into the side elevation of the roof extension.

Reason:  To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| All proposed east facing windows within the flank elevation of the outrigger, at first floor level, shall be obscure glazed and non-openable to a height of 1.7 metres (measured internally). This shall remain so in perpetuity.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of the neighbouring property (25 Saville Road), to prevent overlooking and a loss of privacy, in accordance with Policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management DPD and Policy D6 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Single storey side/rear (wrap around) extension, first floor side extension with associated external works (following demolition of existing rear additions); demolition of existing front porch; insertion of three bay windows to front and side elevations and entrance door to side elevation; rear roof extension, (following removal of three chimney stacks).
